word: H3426 - יֵשׁ - yêsh - yaysh - Are - உள்ளன

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - இரு, உண்டுபண்ணு. உண்டாகு, வைத்திரு, நேரிடு, உண்டாயிரு, கொள், மெய்பொருள்,
being, existence, substance, there is, there are

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Perhaps from an unused root meaning to stand out, or exist; entity; used adverbially or as a copula for the substantive verb (H1961); there is or are (or any other form of the verb to be, as may suit the connection): - (there) are, (he, it, shall, there, there may, there shall, there should) be, thou do, had, hast, (which) hath, (I, shalt, that) have, (he, it, there) is, substance, it (there) was, (there) were, ye will, thou wilt, wouldest.
Cognate: H3426, H3455, H3480, H3485
